biocontainers.summary: NextGenMap is a flexible highly sensitive short read mapping tool that

biotools.summary: NextGenMap is a flexible highly sensitive short read mapping tool that handles much higher mismatch rates than comparable algorithms while still outperforming them in terms of runtime.
